original_text: Their possessions and settlements were Bethel and its towns, and to the east Naaran, and to the west Gezer and its towns, Shechem and its towns, and Ayyah and its towns;
korean_text: 에브라임 자손의 토지와 거주지는 벧엘과 그 주변 마을이요 동쪽으로는 나아란이요 서쪽에는 게셀과 그 주변 마을이며 또 세겜과 그 주변 마을이니 아사와 그 주변 마을까지이며

sentences.original_text: Their possessions and settlements were Bethel and its towns
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 소유와 거주지는 벧엘과 그 성읍들이었으며

sentences.original_text: and to the west Gezer and its towns
